name: Shrink Ray
description: Aim a shrink ray to miniaturize oncoming obstacles before they crush you, but shrunk objects become fast ricocheting projectiles you must also dodge.
core_loop: Objects of various sizes scroll toward you from the right. Tap/click on them to zap with your shrink ray â€” they shrink to tiny size but ricochet off walls and floor at high speed. You dodge vertically (drag/swipe up-down or arrow keys) to avoid both the incoming large objects AND the tiny bouncing ones you created. Shrinking objects scores points and clears space, but every zap adds a new fast-moving hazard to the arena. The screen gradually fills with your own ricochets, creating escalating self-inflicted chaos. Combo multipliers for rapid-fire shrinking, and periodic 'reverse ray' pickups let you RE-GROW a tiny bouncer into a slow, harmless big object to clear breathing room.
retention_hooks: Self-created chaos: every action makes it harder, creating a unique 'I did this to myself' tension that begs retries
High score chasing with combo multipliers for rapid-fire shrinking streaks
Reverse ray power-up creates satisfying strategic moments â€” which ricochet do you neutralize?
controls: Tap/click objects to shrink them. Drag or swipe vertically to dodge (mobile), arrow keys or mouse position to move (desktop). One-hand playable on mobile.
